name: A Brief History of Golf
description:
Join us on a journey of absolute historical accuracy, as we explore a brief history of golf, via the medium of videogames.

Golf, as I'm sure you all know, is a game where you need to score less to achieve more. Please be considering golf while you play this game about golf. Thank you. 

Please activate your audio devices (headphones, speakers, whatever) to get the full experience, as otherwise, you'll just be playing a physics-based golf-type game and you can get one of those anywhere. 

Gameplay, music (well alright, it's a cover of Strauss' Voices of Spring, but I did at least make the cover) sound effects and narration are all by Zayne Black

Graphical assets (mostly) created by Jay

Please note: Any build other than Win64 has been automatically generated by Construct 3, and has not been tested. No quality assurance is implied or provided, and these are only provided as a back-up option for those of you who cannot run the HTML5 version.
